div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 08:35 am CDT

div.div: Scattered showers and thunderstorms, mainly after 3pm. Patchy fog before 9am. Otherwise, mostly cloudy, with a high near 69. South wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
Scattered showers and thunderstorms, then showers after 1am. Low around 52. Light and variable wind becoming north around 6 mph after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 80%.
Showers, mainly before 4pm. High near 59. North wind 7 to 11 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

div.center: Please visit the CLOSURE tab from our Menu to view details about COVID-19 Closures, Food Service, and Learning Packets.

img.alt: graduation rescheduled with cap and bobcat face

div.p: The Lonedell Board of Education approved a new graduation date at last night's board meeting. The new date will be Tuesday, June 30th at 7:00 pm. In the event that restrictions are still in place at that time, the alternative date is July . . .
